title: srI sukra bhagavaantham
sahitya:
s'rI s'ukra-bhagavanta.m | chintayAmi santata.m |

sakalatattvajN~a.m ||

(shree)



anupallavi



hE s'ukra-bhagava.n! maa.m |  As'u-pAlaya

vRSHa-tulA-dhees'a daitya-hitOpadEs'a |

kes'ava-kaTaakSHaika-nEtra.m kireeTadhara.m dhavala-gaatra.m ||

(shree)



caraNam



vi.ms'Adi vatsarODhu-das'avibhAga.m aSHtavargam ka-

vi.m kalatra-kAraka.m ravi-nirjhara-guruvairiNa.m na-

vA.ms'a-horA-drEkkaaNaadi vargOttama avasara-samayE

vakrOccha-neecha-svakSHEtravara-kendramoola-trikONE

tri.ms'A.ms'a-SHaDya.ms'-airAvatA.msa-pArijAtA.ms'a- gO-

purA.ms'a-rAjayOga-kAraka.m rAjyapradam guruguha-mudam ||

(shree)
